meta.title: CodeWithEmmy | Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Portfolio website showcasing product design work and skills

about.bio: I build robust, scalable, and user-friendly web and mobile applications. I'm a self-taught programmer and freelancer with over 2+ years of experience in Full Stack development. I specialize in creating seamless digital solutions from concept to deployment. Passionate about clean code, accessibility, and delivering real business value.
focus: Developing scalable and maintainable web applications
Integrating modern front-end and back-end technologies

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Lead Software Engineer responsible for designing and implementing end-to-end web solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time. Utilize modern frameworks and cloud services to build scalable applications.
achievements: Built a real-time dashboard, For the learning management system, increasing user engagement by 35%
Contributed to API documentation and testing
Fast Deployment of the project within the stipulated time frame

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Lead the development of flagship web applications, managing a team of 3 developers. Architected and implemented scalable solutions using modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud services. Conducted code reviews, optimized performance, and ensured best practices.
achievements: Built a real-time dashboard, increasing user engagement by 35%
Led the launch of 3 major features, contributing to a 25% increase in user retention
Established CI/CD pipelines that improved deployment speed and reliability

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Worked with cross-functional teams to deliver web and mobile applications for various clients. Developed RESTful APIs, integrated third-party services, and implemented responsive UIs.
achievements: Delivered 12+ client projects across fintech, healthcare, and e-commerce
Improved application performance by an average of 22% through code optimization
Mentored junior developers and led code review sessions

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Assisted the engineering team in building and maintaining web applications. Participated in code reviews, bug fixing, and feature development.
achievements: Improved mobile responsiveness for the company website
Helped create a reusable component library
Contributed to API documentation and testing

education.degree: Higher National Diploma in Computer Science

clientReviews.review: Emmanuel demonstrated exceptional technical expertise and professionalism throughout our project. He architected and delivered a robust, scalable financial dashboard that exceeded our expectations. His proactive communication, attention to detail, and ability to solve complex problems made a significant impact on our product's success. I highly recommend Emmanuel to anyone seeking a reliable and talented full stack developer.

It was a pleasure working with Emmanuel on our healthcare platform. He was quick to understand our requirements, provided valuable insights, and delivered high-quality code on time. His dedication and collaborative approach ensured a smooth development process from start to finish.

Emmanuel's expertise in full stack development was evident from the start. He delivered our logistics management system with impressive speed and precision. His ability to troubleshoot and optimize performance was invaluable. We look forward to working with him again.
Working with Emmanuel was a seamless experience. He transformed our ideas into a functional and visually appealing e-learning platform. His professionalism and technical skills are top-notch.
Emmanuel exceeded our expectations by delivering a robust and scalable web application for our agritech startup. His attention to detail and commitment to quality were outstanding.
